resources:
TryMyUI Alert android Did you forget your password? Forgot Password Send feedback Report an issue Leave test Please submit the email address associated with your account and we will send you a password reset link. Enter your registered email... Submit Type your feedback here... Please be specific to help us address your feeback. For exmample, If feedback concerns a test, please add the test ID. Thank you. How to take a test with TryMyUI Example: Testing a Mobile App Watch this tutorial video to learn everything you need to know in order to be the best tester Watch video Okd Something went wrong. Please try again later. Welcome to Example video: How to test Checking update. New version available. Yes Yes, I do No, I don\'t No Later Rate Update Please wait. What’s new: \n Please check your internet connectivity. Email: Type here Authenticatication is in progress. Email address is not valid. Password should be at least 4 characters. Test ID is not valid. Username is not valid. There are no usability tests that meet your demographics available at this time. We will notify you by email when one comes up that meets your demographics. You can also check back here anytime. You haven\'t performed tests yet. Please complete your pending tests to view this data. OK Send My status: The customer has required the following additional requirements: The customer has required the following additional technical requirements: This test requires you to record your face in addition to your screen while testing.\n If you are willing to do so, please click YES below. Your first task: When you hit "Start Test", we will show you a website or app for about 15 seconds and then we will ask you about your impressions of this website. Please say out loud what you are looking at and what you notice. Start Test Do you meet these requirements? Do you want to proceed? Logout successful Please leave a message to post. Feedback posted successfully. If you haven\'t already, please install the app now. When you are done, move on to the next task. When you hit Start Recording, TryMyUI will start capturing everything that\'s displayed on screen.\n\nDuring your test, tap the UI bubble to view or hide the current task.
If you have completed this test, hit the Finish Recording button below.\n\nYour Recording will be auto-saved to your device, and you will be asked to confirm it for upload.
Have a unique test code? Please enter login information below Please enter test code and basic info Are you a TryMyUI tester? Full name Test code Special requirements Technical requirements There are currently no available tests. \n Please check back soon. Non-disclosure agreement I have read, understand and agree
Click here Install app Open test website TryMyUI Tester TryMyUI account Test with unique code Go to Frame of Mind Select an option below to start testing Back to tasks Go to first task > Your recording time limit has been reached. Do you want to upload video? Upload Do you want to upload this video? If you do not meet the requirements, we will remove this test from your dashboard. Are you sure you wish to reject this test? There is no recorded video in your path The video is uploading.\nPlease Wait. Please say out loud how you meet the following special criteria asked for by the customer: Continue to Frame of Mind Continue to Impression test Continue to Technical qualification Yes, I Understood! Please read the frame of mind aloud. Next Previous Failed to upload video. Failed to upload video, canceling your test. Are you sure to cancel the test? Done SUBMIT NEXT > There are no survey questions available for this test. There are no UX Crowd questions available for this test. Name: Test ID: Log in Forgot password? Continue Begin test Special Criteria Technical Criteria Please Note: < BACK Please be specific to help us address your feedback. For example, if feedback concerns a test, please add the test ID. Thank you. Please include a Test ID if relevant.
How easy or difficult did you find this task?
Please rate and indicate task completion before moving to next task. Please rate this task before moving to next task. Please indicate task completion before moving to next task. Video uploaded successfully. Impression Test
When you hit "Start the Test" we will show you a website for 15 secounds. Then, we will ask you some questions about your first impression. \n\n Please say what you are looking at and describe what you are seeing and thinking.
Q
When you hit "Start the Test" we will show you a website for 15 secounds. Then, we will ask you some questions about your first impression. \n Please say what you are looking at and describe what you are seeing and thinking.
Q1: Say 3 words you remember from the site, or would use to describe the site.
\n\n Q2: What is this site about?
\n\n Q3: What services and/or products are offered on this site? For whom?
\n\n Q4. What is the feel of the site? (e.g. professional, fun, small-company, corporate?)
I’M DONE WITH THE IMPRESSION TEST Please enter your email address.\nYou will be send a link which you can use to change your password. RESET PASSWORD Return to Sign In Or, enter your test code to begin
Your Test is Running.\n Please click on bubble if you want to continue with the running test.\n Also you can terminate the test by long press and drag the bubble to close sign.
SIGN IN
Testing sessions interrupted by texts, calls, or background noises may get rejected. Consider turning on di mode.
You can find this in Settings -> Sound & Notification -> Do Not Disturb Access.
You can find this in Settings -> Installed apps -> Permission -> Other Permission -> TryMyUI -> Display pop-up window ->Accept
Turn on UI bubble permissions You must permit drawing over other apps in order to start this test. Please update to latest version of the Android Mobile App. For any help using the Android app, please send an email to support@trymyui.com. Unfortunately, you do not qualify to take this test based on the criteria set by the researchers. Thank you for your interest.
default
Hello Folks, Due to upgradation in google playstore policies few permissions are must to accomplish certain task in our App.Without allowing those permissions we cant allow our users to go ahead to take test.
Go to Settings Cancel Get started! Get to know
mobile testing How to get your Android \n device set up for testing with \n TryMyUI Got it > The TryMyUI app is already set up to\n record your screen and your voice. We\'re going to show you how to turn on a \n special setting so that we can record your\n taps, swipes, and gestures too. Next > 1. \nTurn on Developer Options In your phone\'s Settings, find the \n \"Build number\" - try looking in System,\nAbout Phone, or Software Info. in a row \n to turn on your Developer Options. Tap on \"Build number\" 7 times
Show taps Show visual feedback for taps
2. \n Enable \"Show taps\" setting The Developer Options menu will now be \n available in your Settings. (Look for it in \n System, it may be under \"Advanced\"). Scroll down until you see a setting called \n \"Show taps\" or \"Show touches\" and \n switch it on. You can turn your \"Show taps\" setting off\n in between tests. Just make sure it\'s ON \n before starting a TryMyUI test! Ready to test! Finish Have you enabled \"Show touches\" Gesture? Turn on \"Show taps\" Yes, show me again Back to dashboard Sorry, you are not eligible Show taps already enabled Need help turning on gesture recording? You must allow this permission in order to perform TryMyUI tests, or we will not be able to collect and share your complete feedback with the customer. Exit
Turn on in settings https://beta.trymyui.com/android_app_demo_video.mp4 Something went wrong. Please try again later.
Everything you need to know to successfully take a usability test on the TryMyUI app (3 min). Continue Error.
Information Caution Are you sure?\n\nYou are currently eligible to take this test.However, if you navigate away now you will lose the chance to perform it. Yes, I want to exit this test. No, I will continue the test.
No Thanks Rate now Hey,You have succesfully completed the test.How about rating us 5-star Enjoying TryMyUI? \n Tap a star to leave us a rating. Thank you for your feedback\nLet us know how we can improve using feeback section in your app\'s menu. Not Now Add a comment Please use all 3 of your votes *Submitted votes cannot be revised Cancel Save *You have 3 votes to spend on one or more answers. Please select an answer to proceed
Please check one or more boxes to proceed
Please select a rating Please answer the question Likeliness to recommend

Take test Check eligibility Preview test IPA processing Dashboard My tests TryMyUI Test ID: Test duration: Mobile website test Mobile app test pre-test screener questions REJECTED ABANDONED PAID PENDING PENDING CUSTOMER APPROVAL ACCEPTED Proceed to survey Please answer the question below Confirm Resume test Please complete the post test survey Includes pre-test screener survey You are now ready to start this test Please turn on \"Do not disturb\" if you have \n not already. Remember to speak clearly. Email Address not valid Password invalid Test id not valid Username not valid Please check your email for instructions to reset your password. Thank you for your feedback.\n We really appreciate it and will get back to you. Tap "\Start test\" when you\'re ready to start recording
